subject: Soccer
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Rooney scored on a penalty kick in his 100th international appearance and Welbeck added two goals as England defeated Slovenia, 3-1, in a Euro 2016 qualifying match.
snippet: Rooney scored on a penalty kick in his 100th international appearance and Welbeck added two goals as England defeated Slovenia, 3-1, in a Euro 2016 qualifying match.
